response.overview: In 2014, Steven Wilson released a meticulously remixed version of Yes's seminal 1971 album, The Yes Album. This edition features newly crafted stereo and 5.1 surround sound mixes, offering enhanced clarity and depth to the original recordings. Included are bonus tracks such as an extended version of "A Venture" and a studio rendition of "Clap," providing fans with a refreshed listening experience that honors the album's progressive rock legacy.
response.title: Yes - The Yes Album
